site.title: Crystal Development SRL
site.description: We develop custom digital solutions for companies and startups. Web design, mobile app development, management systems, and more.
site.keywords: web development, mobile app development, web design, custom software, software development, digital solutions, startups, companies, Jujuy, Argentina

hero.title: Top-notch digital experiences
hero.subtitle: We develop customized digital solutions for companies and startups.

step1.title: Design
step1.description: We listen to your needs and search for the best way to help you using technology.

step2.title: Development
step2.description: We develop the solution that best suits your needs, using the latest technologies.

step3.title: Launch
step3.description: We launch the solution and provide support to ensure its success.

services.title: Our specialties
services.description: We love to get involved in new challenges, which is why we specialize in developing tailor-made systems to make your company grow without limits, always guaranteeing a high end final result at the level of the best.
services.cardWebDescriptrion: 100% personalized and looking to convey your unique style
services.cardSoftwareDescription: Designed for you to manage your company from anywhere
services.cardDevelopmentDescription: Tailor-made for the way your company or business works
services.cardSolutionsDescription: Comprehensive infrastructure solutions, including network installation, video surveillance systems and equipment maintenance

tools.title: We use industry-leading tools
tools.subtitle: If you need something that's not on the list, feel free to ask us!

q1.question: How do we work together in the development process?
q1.answer: Our process includes initial consultations to understand your needs, design and iterative development with your constant feedback, thorough testing, and finally, implementation on your server or web hosting.

q2.question: Can you maintain and update my website after delivery?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer website maintenance and update services to ensure your site is always running optimally and updated with the latest technologies.

q3.question: Can you help me migrate my current website to a new platform?
q3.answer: Yes, we offer website migration services, allowing you to switch to a more modern and customized platform without losing data or functionality.

q4.question: How do you handle technical issues or interruptions on the website after launch?
q4.answer: We provide continuous technical support and promptly resolve issues. We also implement constant monitoring to prevent problems before they occur.
